function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sending food to healthcare workers in various hospitals may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not taken in the food preparation and delivery process.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases among healthcare workers and other stakeholders in hospitals.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for food preparation and delivery, including regular sanitization of facilities and equipment, and training for staff on safe food handling practices.","Technologies":"Food safety management systems, contactless delivery technology, antimicrobial packaging materials.","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital staff, patients, delivery personnel.","Owner":"Food service brands, health authorities, hospital management."},{"Description":"Frequent change in customer preferences during turbulent environments may lead to challenges in maintaining food safety standards and hygiene practices.","Impact":"Potential increase in foodborne illnesses and contamination due to fluctuating demand and supply dynamics.","Mitigation":"Conduct regular assessments of customer preferences and adapt food safety protocols accordingly, invest in technology for real-time monitoring of food safety measures, and provide continuous training to staff on hygiene and sanitation best practices.","Technologies":"Data analytics for customer behavior, IoT sensors for monitoring food storage and preparation, online training platforms for staff.","People":"Food service staff, customers, suppliers.","Owner":"Food service brands, quality control departments, supply chain managers."}]}
